examples: he complained about the length of time required

results.definition: size of the gap between two places
examples: he determined the length of the shortest line segment joining the two points

results.definition: a section of something that is long and narrow
the linear extent in space from one end to the other; the longest dimension of something that is fixed in place
examples: the length of the table was 5 feet

results.definition: the property of being the extent of something from beginning to end
examples: the editor limited the length of my article to 500 words
